author: Dan Primack
title: Serological coronavirus testing could be key to economic reopening
description: America's economy won't reopen anytime soon, despite frantic CEO whispers, but a glimmer of hope may be emerging in the form of serological testing. Why it matters: Serologic tests aren't to determine whether or not you're infected with coronavirus. They are …
content:
America's economy won't reopen anytime soon, despite frantic CEO whispers, but a glimmer of hope may be emerging in the form of serological testing.
